A futuristic biodome on Mars, with lush terrestrial forests inside, contrasting with the red Martian landscape outside, sci-fi concept art.
Close-up of a dragon's eye, with a fiery galaxy swirling within the iris, photorealistic, macro photography.
A quiet, rainy night in a cyberpunk city alley, neon signs reflecting in the puddles, cinematic, moody atmosphere.

Crystalline cave shimmering with bioluminescent fungi, a hidden world underground, fantasy landscape, unreal engine.

An astronaut discovering an ancient alien artifact on a desolate moon, sense of wonder and isolation, matte painting, epic.
